trans-unit.source: Represents an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 代表 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 structure originated in the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) working groups.
trans-unit.target: 在國際標準組織 (ISO) 工作群組中產生 X.509 結構。

trans-unit.source: This structure can be used to represent various types of information including identity, entitlement, and holder attributes (permissions, age, sex, location, affiliation, and so forth).
trans-unit.target: 這個結構可以用來代表不同類型的資訊包括識別、 權限，以及持有者的屬性 （權限、 年齡、 性別、 位置、 關係，等等）。

trans-unit.source: Although the ISO specifications are most informative on the structure itself, the X509Certificate2 class is designed to model the usage scenarios defined in specifications issued by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) Public Key Infrastructure, X.509 (PKIX) working group.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 ISO 規格結構本身的資訊最多，但 X509Certificate2 類別被設計來建立模型的使用案例，網際網路工程任務推動小組 (IETF) 公開金鑰基礎結構，X.509 (PKIX) 工作小組所發出的規格中定義。

trans-unit.source: The most informative of these specifications is RFC 3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)."
trans-unit.target: 資訊的這些規格是 RFC 3280"[憑證和憑證撤銷清單 (CRL) 設定檔](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。 」

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，這個型別會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: > > For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/add/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the X509Certificate2 class does not implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method.
trans-unit.target: >> 為目標的應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/add/includes/net-v452-md.md)]和舊版中，X509Certificate2 類別未實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面，並因此不需要`Dispose`方法。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object, unlike the other constructors for this class that use certificate information from a byte array, a pointer, or a certificate file.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立空<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件，與不同的其他建構函式這個類別使用的位元組陣列、 指標或憑證檔案的憑證資訊。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> class using information from a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>類別使用位元組陣列中的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object using certificate information from a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>使用位元組陣列中的憑證資訊的物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: The byte array can be binary (DER) encoded or Base64-encoded X.509 data.
trans-unit.target: 編碼的二進位 (DER) 或 Base64 編碼 X.509 資料，可以是位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The byte array can also be a PKCS7 (Authenticode) signed file; the signer certificate is used to create the object.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列也可以是 PKCS7 (Authenticode) 已簽署檔案。簽章者憑證用來建立物件。

trans-unit.source: If you create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`rawData`、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>簽署存放區的憑證，而不是任何憑證存放區中建立。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，包含來自 X.509 憑證的資料。

trans-unit.source: An error with the certificate occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤的憑證。

trans-unit.source: For example: - The certificate file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 例如:-憑證檔案不存在。

trans-unit.source: - The certificate is invalid.
trans-unit.target: -憑證無效。

trans-unit.source: - The certificate's password is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: -憑證的密碼不正確。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> class using an unmanaged handle.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>類別使用 unmanaged 控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object using a handle for the Microsoft Cryptographic API certificate context, `PCCERT_CONTEXT`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件控制代碼使用適用於 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API 的憑證內容， `PCCERT_CONTEXT`。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Note that the immediate caller of this constructor requires unmanaged code permission.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個建構函式的立即呼叫端需要 unmanaged 程式碼權限。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The constructor creates a copy of the certificate context.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 建構函式會建立憑證內容的複本。

trans-unit.source: Do not assume that the context structure you passed to the constructor is valid; it may have been released.
trans-unit.target: 不會假設您傳遞至建構函式的內容結構是有效的。都已釋放。

trans-unit.source: You can get a copy of the current `PCCERT_CONTEXT` structure from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Handle%2A> property, but it is valid only during the lifetime of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得一份目前`PCCERT_CONTEXT`結構從<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Handle%2A>屬性，但是它是有效的存留期間只<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a certificate context in unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: Unmanaged 程式碼中的憑證內容的指標。

trans-unit.source: The C structure is called <xref uid="langword_csharp_PCCERT_CONTEXT" name="PCCERT_CONTEXT" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: C 結構稱為<xref uid="langword_csharp_PCCERT_CONTEXT" name="PCCERT_CONTEXT" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An error with the certificate occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤的憑證。

trans-unit.source: For example: - The certificate file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 例如:-憑證檔案不存在。

trans-unit.source: - The certificate is invalid.
trans-unit.target: -憑證無效。

trans-unit.source: - The certificate's password is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: -憑證的密碼不正確。

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>類別使用的位元組陣列和密碼。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會搭配 PKCS12 (PFX) 檔案包含憑證的私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a key container.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個建構函式，以正確的密碼將私密金鑰解密，並將它儲存到金鑰容器。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Never hard code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating that an X.509 certificate is archived.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 已封存的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: This property is set only on a certificate that is associated with a store.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定只在存放區相關聯的憑證。

trans-unit.source: If the property is set and the certificate is added to a certificate store, the value is persisted.
trans-unit.target: 如果此屬性設定，而且憑證會新增至憑證存放區，值會保存。

trans-unit.source: If the property is set on a certificate retrieved from a store, the value is persisted immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定在從存放區擷取憑證，就會立即保存值。

trans-unit.source: In an X.509 store, archived certificates are not included in the returned <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object unless the Archived property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: X.509 存放區中封存的憑證不會包含在傳回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>物件已封存屬性設定為除非`true`。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: No physical archival activity occurs when the Archived value is set or unset.
trans-unit.target: 設定或取消已封存值時，就會不發生任何實體的封存活動。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate is archived, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the certificate is not archived.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果憑證是否封存， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果憑證不會封存。

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable.
trans-unit.target: 無法讀取憑證。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The extensions defined in the X.509 v3 certificate format allow additional data to be included in the certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509 v3 憑證格式中定義的延伸可讓要包含在憑證的其他資料。

trans-unit.source: A number of extensions are defined by ISO in the X.509 v3 definition as well as by PKIX in RFC 3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)."
trans-unit.target: 許多擴充功能會由 ISO X.509 v3 定義中以及在 RFC 3280 PKIX"[憑證和憑證撤銷清單 (CRL) 設定檔](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。 」

trans-unit.source: Common extensions include information regarding key usage (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension>), key identifiers (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension>), certificate policies, revocation information (CRL Distribution Point extension), and other uses.
trans-unit.target: 常見的延伸模組包含金鑰使用方式的相關資訊 (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension>)，索引鍵識別項 (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension>)，憑證原則、 撤銷資訊 （CRL 發佈點延伸模組） 和其他用途。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable.
trans-unit.target: 無法讀取憑證。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the associated alias for a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定憑證相關聯的別名。

trans-unit.source: Friendly names are properties in the X.509 certificate store that can be set.
trans-unit.target: 好記的名稱是您可以將 X.509 憑證存放區中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: They are used to enable a user to associate aliases with certificates so they can be easily identified.
trans-unit.target: 它們可用來讓使用者別名與憑證產生關聯，這樣可以輕易地辨識它們。

trans-unit.source: If no friendly name exists for the certificate, an empty string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有好記的名稱存在憑證，也就是空字串 ("") 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: The certificate's friendly name.
trans-unit.target: 憑證的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the subject and issuer names from a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得 主旨 與 簽發者名稱的憑證。

trans-unit.source: This method should always be used instead of parsing the certificate, since many of the name values can be located in multiple locations.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應該永遠可用而非剖析憑證，因為許多名稱值可以位於多個位置。

trans-unit.source: Using this method ensures that the appropriate name is returned.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可確保會傳回適當的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509NameType"></xref> value for the subject.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509NameType"> </xref>主體的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the issuer name; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>包含簽發者名稱。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 憑證的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object contains a private key.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>物件包含私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object contains a private key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>物件包含私用金鑰; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The certificate context is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 憑證內容無效。

trans-unit.source: Populates an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object with data from a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 於其中填入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>物件從位元組陣列的資料。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to take a raw byte array of an X.509 certificate and populate the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object with its associated values.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來取得 X.509 憑證的未經處理位元組陣列，並填入<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>及其相關值的物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Since this method accepts only a byte array, it can be used only for certificate types that do not require a password, including a Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificate or a PFX/PKCS12 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會接受位元組陣列，因為它可以只能用於不需要密碼，包括 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證或 PFX/PKCS12 憑證的憑證類型。

trans-unit.source: Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate.
trans-unit.target: 請注意/PKCS12 的 PFX 憑證可以包含多個憑證。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，會使用第一個憑證。

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，包含來自 X.509 憑證的資料。

trans-unit.source: Populates an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object with information from a certificate file.
trans-unit.target: 於其中填入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>憑證檔案資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method uses a certificate file, such as a file with a .cer extension, that represents an X.509 certificate and populates the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object with the certificate the file contains.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用憑證檔案，例如檔案副檔名為.cer，代表 X.509 憑證，並於其中填入<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>檔案包含的憑證物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with several certificate types, including Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates, PFX/PKCS12 certificates, and signer certificates such as Authenticode.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以搭配數個憑證類型，包括 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證 PFX/PKCS12 憑證，例如 Authenticode 簽章者憑證。

trans-unit.source: Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate.
trans-unit.target: 請注意/PKCS12 的 PFX 憑證可以包含多個憑證。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，會使用第一個憑證。

trans-unit.source: The name of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 憑證的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Populates an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object using data from a byte array, a password, and a key storage flag.
trans-unit.target: 於其中填入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>物件使用中的位元組陣列、 密碼及金鑰儲存旗標的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method for certificate types such as Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates, or PFX/PKCS12 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，例如 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證或 PFX/PKCS12 憑證的憑證類型。

trans-unit.source: Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate.
trans-unit.target: 請注意/PKCS12 的 PFX 憑證可以包含多個憑證。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，會使用第一個憑證。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Never hard code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains data from an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，其中包含來自 X.509 憑證的資料。

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the X.509 certificate data.
trans-unit.target: 存取 X.509 憑證資料所需的密碼。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control where and how to import the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的位元組合值可控制的位置和方式匯入憑證。

trans-unit.source: Populates an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object using data from a byte array, a password, and flags for determining how to import the private key.
trans-unit.target: 於其中填入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>物件使用資料的位元組陣列、 密碼和旗標來判斷如何匯入的私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to populate an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object using a password for the certificate represented by the byte array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用來填入<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件使用的位元組陣列所表示的憑證的密碼。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control where and how to import the private key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>值可以用來控制何處以及如何匯入的私密金鑰。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>

trans-unit.source: This method accepts a byte array and can be used for certificate types such as Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates or PFX/PKCS12 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會接受位元組陣列，並可用於例如 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證或 PFX/PKCS12 憑證的憑證類型。

trans-unit.source: Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate.
trans-unit.target: 請注意/PKCS12 的 PFX 憑證可以包含多個憑證。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，會使用第一個憑證。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Never hard code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，包含來自 X.509 憑證的資料。

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the X.509 certificate data.
trans-unit.target: 存取 X.509 憑證資料所需的密碼。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control where and how to import the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的位元組合值可控制的位置和方式匯入憑證。

trans-unit.source: Populates an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object with information from a certificate file, a password, and a key storage flag.
trans-unit.target: 於其中填入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>物件使用的憑證檔案、 密碼及金鑰儲存旗標資訊。

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** Never hard code a password within your source code.

trans-unit.source: The name of a certificate file.
trans-unit.target: 憑證檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the X.509 certificate data.
trans-unit.target: 存取 X.509 憑證資料所需的密碼。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control where and how to import the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的位元組合值可控制的位置和方式匯入憑證。

trans-unit.source: Populates an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object with information from a certificate file, a password, and a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 於其中填入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>憑證檔案，密碼資訊的物件和<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used populate an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object with information from a certificate file, a password, and an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用填入<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>憑證檔案，密碼資訊的物件和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>值。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Never hard code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。

trans-unit.source: The name of a certificate file.
trans-unit.target: 憑證檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the X.509 certificate data.
trans-unit.target: 存取 X.509 憑證資料所需的密碼。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control where and how to import the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的位元組合值可控制的位置和方式匯入憑證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distinguished name of the certificate issuer.
trans-unit.target: 取得憑證簽發者的辨別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the name of the certificate authority (CA) that issued the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性包含核發憑證之憑證授權單位 (CA) 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the name of a certificate, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.GetNameInfo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得憑證的名稱，請使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.GetNameInfo%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.GetNameInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name for the certificate is a textual representation of the certificate subject or issuer.
trans-unit.target: 憑證的辨別的名稱是憑證主體或簽發者的文字表示。

trans-unit.source: This representation consists of name attributes (for example, "CN=MyName, OU=MyOrgUnit, C=US").
trans-unit.target: 這表示會包含名稱的屬性 (例如，"CN = MyName，OU = MyOrgUnit，C = US")。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName"></xref> object that contains the name of the certificate issuer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName"> </xref>物件，包含憑證簽發者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The certificate context is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 憑證內容無效。

trans-unit.source: Gets the date in local time after which a certificate is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得以本地時間之後，憑證便不再有效的日期。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates an expiration date on which the certificate becomes invalid.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出憑證變成無效的到期日。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object that represents the expiration date for the certificate.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>物件，表示憑證的到期日。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable.
trans-unit.target: 無法讀取憑證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the date in local time on which a certificate becomes valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得憑證生效的當地時間的日期。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the date on which the certificate becomes valid.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出憑證生效的日期。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object that represents the effective date of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>物件，表示憑證的有效日期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable.
trans-unit.target: 無法讀取憑證。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> object that represents the private key associated with a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref>物件，表示與憑證相關聯的私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Currently this property supports only RSA or DSA keys, so it returns either an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> or a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前此屬性支援只有 RSA 或 DSA 金鑰，因此它會傳回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: If no private key is associated with the certificate, it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有私密金鑰關聯的憑證，則它會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > If you set this property to `null` or to another key without first deleting it, a private key file is left on the disk.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING] > 如果您將此屬性設定為`null`或另一個不先刪除它的金鑰，磁碟上遺留私密金鑰檔案。

trans-unit.source: To properly delete the private key associated with this property, set `PersistKeyInCsp` to `false`, and then call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要正確地刪除此屬性相關聯的私密金鑰，請設定`PersistKeyInCsp`至`false`，然後呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> object, which is either an RSA or DSA cryptographic service provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref>物件，即 RSA 或 DSA 密碼編譯服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: The key value is not an RSA or DSA key, or the key is unreadable.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的值不是 RSA 或 DSA 金鑰，或無法讀取機碼。

trans-unit.source: The value being set for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是所設定的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The key algorithm for this private key is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援此私用金鑰的金鑰演算法。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 keys do not match.
trans-unit.target: X.509 金鑰不相符。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯服務提供者金鑰是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a PublicKey object associated with a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得與憑證相關聯的 PublicKey 物件。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a PublicKey object, which contains the object identifier (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>) representing the public key algorithm, the ASN.1-encoded parameters, and the ASN.1-encoded key value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回 PublicKey 物件，其中包含的物件識別碼 (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>) 代表公開金鑰演算法、 ASN.1 編碼參數和 ASN.1 編碼金鑰值。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>

trans-unit.source: You can also obtain the key as an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> object by referencing the PublicKey property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以取得與金鑰<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>藉由參考 PublicKey 屬性的物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: This property supports only RSA or DSA keys, so it returns either an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> or a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> object that represents the public key.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性支援只有 RSA 或 DSA 金鑰，因此它會傳回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>物件，代表的公開金鑰。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: A PublicKey object.
trans-unit.target: PublicKey 物件。

trans-unit.source: The key value is not an RSA or DSA key, or the key is unreadable.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的值不是 RSA 或 DSA 金鑰，或無法讀取機碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the raw data of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得憑證的未經處理資料。

trans-unit.source: The raw data of the certificate as a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 做為位元組陣列憑證的未經處理資料。

trans-unit.source: Resets the state of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 重設狀態<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to reset the state of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用來重設之憑證的狀態。

trans-unit.source: It also frees any resources associated with the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 它也會與憑證相關聯的任何資源釋出。

trans-unit.source: Gets the serial number of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得憑證的序號。

trans-unit.source: The serial number of the certificate is part of the original X.509 protocol.
trans-unit.target: 憑證的序號是原始 X.509 通訊協定的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The serial number is a unique number issued by the certificate issuer, which is also called the Certificate Authority (CA).
trans-unit.target: 序號是由憑證簽發者，這也稱為憑證授權單位 (CA) 發行的唯一數字。

trans-unit.source: The serial number of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 憑證的序號。

trans-unit.source: Gets the algorithm used to create the signature of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來建立憑證簽章演算法。

trans-unit.source: The object identifier (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>) identifies the type of signature algorithm used by the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 物件識別元 (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>) 識別之憑證所使用的簽章演算法的類型。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>

trans-unit.source: Returns the object identifier (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref>) of the signature algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件識別碼 (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref>) 的簽章演算法。

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable.
trans-unit.target: 無法讀取憑證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the subject distinguished name from a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得憑證的主旨辨別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The subject distinguished name is the name of the user of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 主體辨別的名稱是使用者的憑證名稱。

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name for the certificate is a textual representation of the subject or issuer of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 主體的文字表示法或憑證簽發者憑證的辨別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This representation consists of name attributes, for example, "CN=MyName, OU=MyOrgUnit, C=US".
trans-unit.target: 這表示會包含名稱的屬性，例如"CN = MyName，OU = MyOrgUnit，C = US"。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName"></xref> object that represents the name of the certificate subject.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName"> </xref>物件，表示憑證主體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The certificate context is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 憑證內容無效。

trans-unit.source: Gets the thumbprint of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得憑證的指紋。

trans-unit.source: The thumbprint is dynamically generated using the SHA1 algorithm and does not physically exist in the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 指紋使用 SHA1 演算法以動態方式產生，並不是實際存在於憑證。

trans-unit.source: Since the thumbprint is a unique value for the certificate, it is commonly used to find a particular certificate in a certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 由於指紋是憑證的唯一值，它通常用於在憑證存放區中尋找特定的憑證。

trans-unit.source: The thumbprint of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 憑證的指紋。

trans-unit.source: Displays an X.509 certificate in text format.
trans-unit.target: 以文字格式顯示 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: As with all `ToString` methods, the output might not be consistent across versions of the .NET Framework, so the method results should not be parsed for content.
trans-unit.target: 如同所有`ToString`方法，輸出可能不是一致版本的.NET Framework 中，因此不應針對內容剖析方法的結果。

trans-unit.source: Use the properties on the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object to obtain precise information about the content or use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.ToString%2A> method to obtain information about the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用屬性<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件取得精確的內容相關資訊，或使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.ToString%2A>方法，以取得憑證的相關資訊。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.ToString%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: This method displays the certificate in text format.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會以文字格式顯示的憑證。

trans-unit.source: The certificate information.
trans-unit.target: 憑證資訊。

trans-unit.source: Displays an X.509 certificate in text format.
trans-unit.target: 以文字格式顯示 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: As with all `ToString` methods, the output might not be consistent across versions of the .NET Framework, so the method results should not be parsed for content.
trans-unit.target: 如同所有`ToString`方法，輸出可能不是一致版本的.NET Framework 中，因此不應針對內容剖析方法的結果。

trans-unit.source: Use the properties on the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object to obtain precise information.
trans-unit.target: 使用屬性<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件取得精確的資訊。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: This method displays the certificate in text format.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會以文字格式顯示的憑證。

trans-unit.source: If the `verbose` parameter is set to `true`, the text display includes the public key, private key, and extensions.
trans-unit.target: 如果`verbose`參數設定為`true`，顯示的文字包含公開金鑰、 私用金鑰和擴充功能。

trans-unit.source: If `verbose` is set to `false`, the text display includes those fields available from the X.509 certificate, including thumbprint, serial number, subject and issuer names, and validity date information.
trans-unit.target: 如果`verbose`設`false`，顯示的文字包含這些欄位可從 X.509 憑證指紋、 序號、 主旨和簽發者名稱和有效日期資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the public key, private key, extensions, and so forth; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to display information that is similar to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> class, including thumbprint, serial number, subject and issuer names, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要顯示公開金鑰、 私密金鑰、 擴充功能和其他等等。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>顯示類似的資訊<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref>類別，包括憑證指紋、 序號、 主旨和簽發者名稱等等。

trans-unit.source: The certificate information.
trans-unit.target: 憑證資訊。

trans-unit.source: Performs a X.509 chain validation using basic validation policy.
trans-unit.target: 執行 X.509 鏈結驗證使用基本驗證原則。

trans-unit.source: This method builds a simple chain for the certificate and applies the base policy to that chain.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會建立簡單的憑證鏈結，而且基底的原則套用至該鏈結。

trans-unit.source: If you need more information about a failure, validate the certificate directly using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要有關失敗的詳細資訊，請驗證直接使用的憑證<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain>

trans-unit.source: Note that the default chaining engine can be overridden using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，鏈結引擎的預設值會覆寫使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>類別。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>

trans-unit.source: On Microsoft Windows Server 2003, the default engine conforms to the specification described in RFC3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)."
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows Server 2003，預設的引擎是否符合規格述 RFC3280，"[憑證和憑證撤銷清單 (CRL) 設定檔](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。 」

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation succeeds; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the validation fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果驗證成功。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果驗證失敗。

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable.
trans-unit.target: 無法讀取憑證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 format version of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得憑證的 X.509 格式版本。

trans-unit.source: There are several versions of X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 有數個版本的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: This property identifies which format the certificate uses.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會識別哪種格式的憑證使用。

trans-unit.source: For example, "3" is returned for a version 3 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"3"會傳回第 3 版憑證。

trans-unit.source: The certificate format.
trans-unit.target: 憑證格式。

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable.
trans-unit.target: 無法讀取憑證。
